projects.title: FinVerse ‚Äì AI-Powered Financial Marketplace
projects.shortDescription: Cloud-native, AI-powered financial marketplace enabling smart comparison, discovery, and personalized financial decisions.
projects.fullDescription: FinVerse is a cloud-native, AI-powered financial marketplace that connects consumers with financial institutions through a single intelligent platform. Users can compare loans, credit cards, fixed deposits, and other financial products across multiple institutions, receive personalized recommendations, and interact with an AI financial assistant powered by Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). The platform is built using a microservices architecture, secured with Auth0, and deployed on Microsoft Azure with private networking and API gateway enforcement.
features: ü§ñ AI-powered financial assistant using Gemini API + LangChain with RAG for product-aware recommendations
üîê Secure authentication and role-based access control using Auth0 (OIDC + JWT)
üìä Financial marketplace supporting comparison of loans, deposits, and credit products across institutions
‚ö° High-performance backend with Redis caching and API Gateway-based routing
üß† Vector-based semantic search using MongoDB for intelligent product retrieval
‚òÅÔ∏è Scalable microservices architecture deployed on Microsoft Azure with private VNet isolation
achievements: Designed and implemented a cloud-native microservices architecture with a single public API entry point
Built an AI-powered financial assistant using Gemini API and LangChain with RAG
Implemented secure authentication and RBAC using Auth0 across frontend and backend
Optimized performance using Redis caching and API Gateway-based request routing
Deployed a production-grade system on Microsoft Azure with CI/CD pipelines

projects.title: VidSage - AI-Powered YouTube Video Analysis Platform
projects.shortDescription: Transforms YouTube videos into interactive, searchable knowledge bases using advanced NLP and RAG pipelines.
projects.fullDescription: A comprehensive AI-powered video analysis platform that transforms YouTube content into interactive, searchable knowledge bases using advanced NLP, RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), and modern UI frameworks. Features dual interfaces and optimized performance with 60% improvement in processing time.
features: üé• AI-driven application that converts YouTube videos into searchable knowledge bases
üîç RAG pipeline with Google Gemini, OpenAI Whisper, and Chroma Vector DB

‚ö° Optimized performance with intelligent caching, cutting processing time by 60%
üéØ Advanced NLP processing with automatic transcription and semantic search
üìö Interactive Q&A system with context-aware responses
